yeasts.name: SafLager Lager
yeasts.description: This famous yeast strain from Weihenstephan in Germany is used world-wide within the brewing industry. SafLager W-34/70 allows to brew beers with a good balance of floral and fruity aromas and gives clean flavors and high drinkable beers.

This famous yeast strain from Weihenstephan in Germany is used world-wide within the brewing industry. SafLager W-34/70 allows to brew beers with a good balance of floral and fruity aromas and gives clean flavors and high drinkable beers.

Wyeast Labs:  2206 Bavarian Lager
White Labs: WLP830 German Lager
Wyeast Labs:  2308 Munich Lager

Dry Yeast:
Fermentis: Saflager W-34/70
